content:
Here are some popular free alarm tone apps that you can download and try out:

1. **Alarmy (iOS, Android)**: Alarmy is a highly-rated app that offers a variety of alarm tones, including gentle wake-up sounds, nature sounds, and even math problems to solve to turn off the alarm.
2. **Timely (iOS, Android)**: Timely offers a range of alarm tones, including gentle wake-up sounds, music, and even a "smart alarm" feature that wakes you up during a light sleep phase.
3. **Alarm Clock Xtreme (iOS, Android)**: This app offers a wide range of alarm tones, including music, nature sounds, and even a "smart alarm" feature. It also has a built-in flashlight and sleep tracker.
4. **Relax Melodies (iOS, Android)**: Relax Melodies offers a range of calming sounds, including nature sounds, white noise, and binaural beats. You can mix and match sounds to create your own custom alarm tone.
5. **Pillow (iOS, Android)**: Pillow is a sleep tracking app that also offers a range of alarm tones, including gentle wake-up sounds, music, and even a "smart alarm" feature that wakes you up during a light sleep phase.
6. **Google Clock (Android)**: Google Clock is a simple yet effective alarm app that offers a range of alarm tones, including gentle wake-up sounds and nature sounds.
7. **Carrot Alarm (iOS)**: Carrot Alarm is a humorous app that offers a range of alarm tones, including sarcastic messages and even a "smart alarm" feature.
8. **Sleep Cycle (iOS, Android)**: Sleep Cycle is a sleep tracking app that also offers a range of alarm tones, including gentle wake-up sounds and a "smart alarm" feature that wakes you up during a light sleep phase.

All of these apps are free to download and offer a range of features to help you wake up feeling more refreshed and alert. You can try out a few and see which one works best for you!
